title: Facile preparation of a CoNiS/CF electrode by SILAR for a high sensitivity non-enzymatic glucose sensor
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10897-10904
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08154K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shi Wang, Ruirui Zhang, Saiwen Ding, Jialin Ao, Ting Shu
CoNiS/CF was prepared by a simple SILAR method for glucose sensor, which exhibited high sensitivity, good repeatability, and stability, and was able to detect glucose in real sample.
